products.title: Dapple Solar Cream Roller Blind
products.description: This range of fabrics feature an effective reflective treatment to the reverse of the fabric to reduce heat and glare keeping your room pleasant in the height of summer whilst also being effective for privacy. This cream roller blind is ideal for rooms that get a lot of sun as the solar coating will help to reflect the light away from your furnishings. Product id: db-rbx0346 fabric colour: cream headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention light filtering: yes dapple solar cream roller blind in cream.
